short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension containing multiple endpoints which users can use to fetch data

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Beanstalk extension can be utilized to make it easy to leverage 3rd party APIs inside of your Clay workspace while minimizing unnecessary Clay credit usage. Credits rollover month to month by default.
